home.description: Welcome to my quiz project! This is the home page of the project.

about.author: Author
about.description_p1: Quizzes Project is your one-stop solution for creating, customizing, and managing quizzes effortlessly. Perfect for educators, trainers, and quiz enthusiasts, our platform simplifies quiz creation and offers robust group management features.
about.description_p2: With Quizzes Project, you can easily design quizzes that suit your needs, making learning engaging and interactive. Efficiently organize users into groups, simplifying quiz distribution and performance tracking. Dive into valuable insights by analyzing user scores and quiz trends, enabling you to refine your teaching or training strategies.

user_profile.update_error: An error occurred while updating user information.
user_profile.delete_user_confirm: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently removed.

register.successful: User successfully created. Redirect to the login page.
register.failed: An error occurred while creating the user.
